title: DIana and Leona lore event
body: i really enjoyed the Gangplank, Twisted fate, Graves and Miss fortune lore event and everything that came with it, so i was thinking for the next one we could have it be about Leona and Diana because id love to see something done with these two lore wise and maybe a solar/ lunar eclipse skins for them? what's everyone else's thoughts and what champions would you want to see get a lore event?

replies.body: they'd probably restart with freljord/noxus/demacia/ionia/whatever they had in the 1st/2nd season than go with mt targon. theres only 3 champs that are from there, its probably not worth it, unless they release a champ from there for le hype, like ao shin, that would be cool. id prefer an event like the rengar khazix one or the 3 freljord sisters one, during a match, between leona and diana. little hard for leona to kill diana though so thats kind of unfair
